file_content.text: Stop right there. Surrender your weapons.
I have an ancient Sith duel to complete. I will do no such thing.
No.
That's a tall demand, coming from someone I've never met.
And who are you?
If I don't surrender, what do you plan to do? Kill me?
Or what?
Thanaton is making his statement before the Dark Council. You will not interfere.
Or I and my apprentices will have something to say about it.
Your master has a truly astonishing number of followers.
Another of Thanaton's lackeys.
I am not his follower. I am his ally.
That's precisely what I intend to do. Thanaton has tried to kill me for the last time.
I will interfere.
Just because he has failed, doesn't mean I will.
Thanaton is dead. I am the future of the Sith. Serve me and I'll forgive this impertinence.
Join me.
Serve you? Do you think I am an apprentice? I am Thanaton's ally, not his follower.
There is a whole strata of politics you have no exposure to. Did you think Thanaton was alone in his beliefs?
Gentlemen, if you would. Kill him.
Gentlemen, if you would. Kill her.
